Rulings.Edison:
●This is a Trigger Effect that activates when Battle Damage is inflicted.
●This effect activates even if you have no Normal Monsters in your GY when this card inflicts Battle Damage, although the effect will do no damage.

PSCT.Base: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Synthesis Spell". When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each Normal Monster in your Graveyard.
